message: I'm excited to offer you this great product for a special introductory price of $180. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I would like to counteroffer at $160.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking more along the lines of $170. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's worth it.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counteroffer at $165.
I'm still confident that my product is worth more than that, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $168, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $166.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $169, but that's as low as I can go. I think it's a fair price, considering the quality of the product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $167.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm going to meet you at $168, but I'm not budging from there. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to make one final counteroffer at $167.
